context_bundle.content:
Replication lag handling.

Symptoms:
- Read-after-write inconsistency
- Stale data on replicas
- Lag metrics increasing

Causes:
- Write-heavy workload
- Large transactions
- Network latency
- Replica resource constraints

Mitigation:
- Read from primary for critical reads
- Session consistency (sticky sessions)
- Causal consistency tokens
- Lag-aware routing

Monitoring:
- Replica lag seconds
- Replication slot status
- Write throughput
- Network metrics
